name: Got Ya!
description:
Stay Here! Don't move ! 

Oh.... really? Will you catch me ?

Got Ya is a game for the TriJam #116 : "Stay there, don't move!"

You are a thief at work. But the police saw you! 

Try to escape and reach the escape door !

S to start

right arrow to (maybe) move

PS: there is a bit of lag when played in browser. Sorry about that.

Made in 3h30 : 

Sounds from freesound.org edited in 30min

Graphics hand drawn and edited in 1h15min

Remaining time for coding, tweaking effects and adjusting difficulty (you have a tiny bit of time to stop when the flash light turns on)
